A mediocre 3rd movie to one of the least loved Pixar films and it still managed to become a trilogy somehow ..... I just don t get the appeal of a Universe where cars can talk Were they just looking at Toy Story and doing the ex act same things ?? If it worked for toys why not cars 🚗. The best thing they did with t his movie was getting rid of Mater and pushing him aside He was basically the main character in the last movie and didn t work at all However my problem still ARE the c haracters and how uninteresting they are. There s not much to Light ing McQueen here He s a hotshot egotistical race car that gets pushed off fame and has to reinvent himself That s the plot here ...... which was also the plot of the first Cars movie. I m just so indifferent with all these Cars movies The visuals are nice and thats an effort that s put into every Disney movie We shouldn t take that for granted But the story was dull I never like the c oncept and outside of Light ing McQueen and Mater I couldn t remember a single character in this movie. Still waiting on The Incredibles 2 .....
